scripts.staging-release: branch=$(git rev-parse --symbolic-full-name --abbrev-ref HEAD); if [[ $branch == "main" ]]; then npm version patch; else echo "Error: you are not in main branch"; fi;
scripts.production-release: branch=$(git rev-parse --symbolic-full-name --abbrev-ref HEAD); if [[ $branch == "releases" ]]; then npm version minor; else echo "Error: you are not in releases branch"; fi;
